ygData.subject: Finding the pod
ygData.msgSnippet: Brix/Octociz struggles to keep control of the transport pod. Outside he can see he s passing over Ramulus, drudging along trying to meet them. They smile as

Brix/Octociz struggles to keep control of the transport pod. Outside 
he can see he's passing over Ramulus, drudging along trying to meet 
them. They smile as they reach the destination. The pod clands with a 
thud about 100 yards away from the stasis pod. They clinb out trying 
to get to his feet, and walks over to the pod. Octociz come up and 
checks the circutry.

"Well, this thing will never fly again, but the DNA Scanners still 
work. It will be awhile before Ramulus gets here. You don't know how 
to use this, so we have to wait for him to remove my spark.

Why don't we put my spark inside the machine. Then you could do it by 
yourself.

"No Brix. I enetred your body to cure you, not to steal it from you. 
Besides, when you're spark is vulnorable like that, we don't know 
what the DNA Scanner will do since you have a split personality. We 
will wait."

They sit beside the pod, waiting for Ramulus.

Vulois

Vulois slaps hus hand against the conference table, muttering to 
himself.

"Too many battles...too many deaths...I must act quickly."

Vulois sets up a transmission that will be sent directly into the 
head of each leader.

"LISTEN UP! YOU KEEP FIGHTING, AND WHAT WILL IT DO FOR YOU? ONLY 
DEATH!!! THERE ARE EMISSARIES AT YOUR BASES. IF YOU WANT TO SURVIVE 
THE ONCOMING ARMAGEDDEN, YOU MUST TALK TO THEM NOW!!!!"

Vulois sits back, wondering if he will ever be listened too.
